titleStmt.title: The famous game of chesse-play truely discouered, and all doubts resolued; so that by reading this small booke thou shalt profit more then by the playing a thousand mates. An exercise full of delight; fit for princes, or any person of what qualitie soeuer. Newly published by A.S. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Saul, Arthur.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By Thomas Snodham] for Roger Iackson, and are to be sould at his shop neere Fleetstreet-Conduit,

notesStmt.note: The last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
